mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment ( type, total_payment, account_bank, account_number, payment_deadline, state, res_id, paid_at ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{totalPayment}, #{accountBank}, #{accountNumber}, #{paymentDeadline}, #{state}, #{resId}, #{paidAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET type = IFNULL( #{type}, type ), total_payment = IFNULL( #{totalPayment}, total_payment ), payment_deadline = IFNULL( #{paymentDeadline}, payment_deadline ), state = IFNULL( #{state}, state ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE payment_id = ${paymentId}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(total_payment) total_payment, FORMATDATETIME(paid_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd') paid_at FROM payment WHERE paid_at > (NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND res_id IN (SELECT res_id FROM reservation WHERE seller_id = #{seller_id}) GROUP BY FORMATDATETIME(paid_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd');
